data.title: How Green Was My Valley Original R1946 U.S. Window Card Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1946 re-release U.S. window card poster for the 1941 film How Green Was My Valley directed by John Ford with Walter Pidgeon / Maureen O'Hara / Anna Lee / Donald Crisp.
